page.title: 04THE HIGH WYCOMBE AIR BASE
page.content: VISTORS WISHING TO ENTER THE AMERICAN AIR BASE IN HIGH WYCOMBE HAVE TO SHOW AN{IDENTITY CARD}BEFORE THE SENTRY WILL ALLOW THEM ACCESS AS{SECURITY}IS EXTREMELY STRICT.DRIVING ROUND THE BASE IS SLOW BECAUSE THE SPEED LIMIT IS 10 MILES PER HOUR.THE BASE IS A SMALL TOWN.THERE IS A CAFETERIA AND A HAMBURGER BAR.THERE IS ALSO A POST OFFICE.THEY HAVE QUITE A FEW{SPORTS {FACILITIES}LIKE TENNIS COURTS AND A BOWLING CENTRE BUT THEY DO NOT HAVE A SWIMMING POOL.THE BASE ALSO HAS A CINEMA AND A HOSPITAL. {EDUCATION}IN THE BASE IS ONLY FOR OLDER CHILDREN.THERE IS A{JUNIOR HIGH {SCHOOL}THAT TEACHES ABOUT 100 PUPILS.OTHER CHILDREN TRAVEL BY BUS TO DIFFERENT SCHOOLS.WHEN WALKING ROUND THE BASE WE SAW MANY TEENAGERS CALLED{ {DORMIES.}THERE ARE 1200 PEOPLE ON THE BASE WHO STAY FOR 5 YEARS.
